[event]
# Barrel
type=event
location=19,8,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=loot/il_chest_common.txt
loot_count=1
mapmod=object,19,8,288
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Barrel

[event]
# Lectern
type=event
location=18,10,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=412,fixed,1
mapmod=background_fringe,13,14,381;object,18,10,276
requires_not_status=emp_il_warp_room_active
set_status=emp_il_warp_room_active,emp_il_warp_room_unknown
tooltip=Lectern

[event]
# Warp teleporter
type=event
location=13,13,2,2
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
requires_status=emp_il_warp_room_active
script=scripts/maps/iron_labyrinth/warp_tele.txt
soundfx=soundfx/environment/teleporter.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Unknown Destination

[event]
# Update tele tile (on_load)
type=event
location=9,9,1,1
activate=on_load
mapmod=background_fringe,13,14,381;object,18,10,276
requires_status=emp_il_warp_room_active

[event]
# brazier sound effect
type=event
location=13,13,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/open_fire_loop.ogg
